title: They keep adding, yi, yasuo and lee sin skins, but wheres the shyvana love?

replies.body: Hasn't even been a year... Super Galaxy was released last May. Come back later XD
Lee's and Yi's previous skins came out in 2015 and Yasuo's was last year, a few months before Shyvana's did. She'll get more skins, don't worry.
Lee's literally just came out tho
He said "PREVIOUS" being  Knock Out Lee Sin and PROJECT:Yi.  Lee now has God Fist, and Yi will have Cosmic Blade sometime later this week or next as the patch launches on Wednesday.
Shyvana has a lot of quality skins to choose from, meanwhile Yorick and Cassiopeia are crying in a corner...
And illaoi? close to 2 seasons, no skin
2 seasons? Man that 1 year and 5 months suddenly added on more time magically?! XD
i believe i said "close" so.. 1 year and 5 months aren't that far actually..
What's wrong with her Super Galaxy skin? The dragon form looks amazing.
